mapper.insert: insert into notice(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select m.name, notice.* from notice inner join member m on notice.writer = m.userid where id = #{id}
select rownum no, n.* from (select name, n.* from notice n inner Join member m on n.writer = m.userid order by id) n order by no desc
